Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Cubs will face the New York Yankees at Wrigley Field on September 8, 2024, starting at 4:20am AEST.
Javier Assad (7-4, 3.21 ERA) will pitch for the Cubs, while Clarke Schmidt (5-3, 2.52 ERA) will start for the Yankees.
The Yankees are favored with a 57% chance of winning according to Stats Insider's simulations.
The Cubs are 1.5-run underdogs with odds of $1.67, while the Yankees are -1.5 favorites with odds of $2.20.
The over/under for total runs scored is set at 7.5, with odds of $1.91 for over and $1.91 for under.
